question: The 6th Asian Dendrochronology Conference is being organized in which Indian city?
explanation: The 6th Asian Dendrochronology Conference being held at the Birbal Sahni Institute of Palaeosciences in Lucknow.This is the first time that the conference is being held in India. Dendrochronology is the study of tree rings that hold a wealth of information about not only a treeâ€™s past but also that of the ecosystem in which it lives.
